entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
